price: Tí dáadáa kan bá ṣẹlẹ̀ sí ọ, ó máa bà wọ́n nínú jẹ́. Tí aburú kan bá sì ṣẹlẹ̀ sí ọ, wọ́n á wí pé: “A kúkú ti gba àṣẹ tiwa ṣíwájú (láti jókòó sílé.)” Wọ́n á pẹ̀yìn dà; wọn yó sì máa dunnú.
arabic: إِن تُصِبۡكَ حَسَنَةٞ تَسُؤۡهُمۡۖ وَإِن تُصِبۡكَ مُصِيبَةٞ يَقُولُواْ قَدۡ أَخَذۡنَآ أَمۡرَنَا مِن قَبۡلُ وَيَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُمۡ فَرِحُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: in tuṣib'ka ḥasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tuṣib'ka muṣībatun yaqūlū qad akhadhnā amranā min qablu wayatawallaw wahum fariḥūna
